terms-2: I agree to Terms, Conditions & Privacy Policy.
terms-condition-content-1: Welcome to StockFusion ERP, a stock and expense tracking system designed to streamline your business operations. By using our software, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
terms-condition-content-2.1: StockFusion ERP grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the software. Any unauthorized use is prohibited.
terms-condition-content-3.1: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms-condition-content-4.2: Use StockFusion ERP for any illegal activities.
terms-condition-content-4.3: Modify, copy, or reverse engineer the software.
terms-condition-content-4.4: Transfer access or provide unauthorized access to third parties.
terms-condition-content-5.1: All data entered into StockFusion ERP is owned by the user or their business. StockFusion ERP is responsible for maintaining and safeguarding your data, but we are not liable for any data loss due to user actions or third-party breaches.
terms-condition-content-6.1: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to StockFusion ERP without notice for any breach of these terms.
terms-condition-content-7.1: StockFusion ERP is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of this software, including, but not limited to, data loss or system errors.
privacy-policy-content-1.1: StockFusion ERP collects data that you provide, including account information, business details, and stock/expense records. We also collect certain technical data like your IP address and device type to improve our services.
privacy-policy-content-2.1: The information collected is used to
privacy-policy-content-2.3: Ensure the security and functionality of the system.
privacy-policy-content-2.4: Communicate with you about updates and relevant notifications.
privacy-policy-content-3.1: We do not share your personal or business data with third parties unless required by law or to protect our legal rights.
privacy-policy-content-4.1: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy-policy-content-5.1: You have the right to access, modify, and delete your personal data within the system. For any data-related requests, please contact our support team.
privacy-policy-content-6.1: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. You will be notified of any significant changes.
privacy-policy-content-7.1: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our terms or privacy practices, please contact us at support@stockfusion.com.
user-details-line: Please fill to create your account.
